return_policy.question: What is your return policy?
return_policy.answer: We offer 30-day returns for unused items. Full refund or store credit available. Free return shipping on orders over $50. Return process takes 5-7 business days after we receive your item.

shipping_time.question: How long does shipping take?
shipping_time.answer: Standard shipping: 3-5 business days. Express shipping: 1-2 business days. Free shipping on orders over $100. You'll get a tracking number when your order ships.

payment_methods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment_methods.answer: We accept credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, Amex), PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay. All payments are secure and encrypted.

warranty.question: Do you offer warranty?
warranty.answer: All electronics come with a 1-year manufacturer's warranty. This covers defects but not accidental damage. Extended warranty available at checkout.

international_shipping.question: Do you ship internationally?
international_shipping.answer: Yes! We ship to 50+ countries. International shipping takes 7-14 business days. Customs fees may apply. Use code INTL10 for 10% off international orders.

order_cancellation.question: Can I cancel my order?
order_cancellation.answer: Orders can be cancelled within 1 hour of purchase, before they ship. After shipping, you can return the item for refund. Contact us immediately at support@store.com to cancel.
